# CLPFUDecompositionDatabase

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

CLPFUDecompositionDatabase provides a calculation pipeline for decomposition analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of CLPFUDecompositionDatabase from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MatthewHeun/CLPFUDecompositionDatabase")
```
